propDescriptions.alt: Used in combination with src or srcSet to provide an alt attribute for the rendered img element.
propDescriptions.children: Used to render icon or text elements inside the Avatar if src is not set. This can be an element, or just a string.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.imgProps: Attributes applied to the img element if the component is used to display an image. It can be used to listen for the loading error event.
propDescriptions.srcSet: The srcSet attribute for the img element. Use this attribute for responsive image display.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

fallback.description: Styles applied to the fallback icon
